name: centroid
description:
The centroid command calculates centroid points from ways and polygons. Converts complex geometries to simple points representing their center.

Useful for:
- Creating point layers from building footprints
- Simplifying polygon data for analysis
- Generating label points

options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)
options.--include-nodes: Include nodes as-is (they are already points)

output:
Point features representing centroids with:
- id: Original element ID
- type: 'node' or 'way'
- name: Feature name
- All original tags
- node_count: Number of nodes in original way
examples: osmfast centroid city.osm --filter building=* -f csv -o centroids.csv
